flows.name: airlines32
flows.query: SELECT airline, code FROM [bigquery-samples.airline_ontime_data.airline_id_codes] WHERE airline != 'Description' group by airline, code order by airline limit 32

flows.name: airlines100
flows.query: SELECT airline, code FROM [bigquery-samples.airline_ontime_data.airline_id_codes] WHERE airline != 'Description' group by airline, code order by airline limit 100

flows.name: airlines500
flows.query: SELECT airline, code FROM [bigquery-samples.airline_ontime_data.airline_id_codes] WHERE airline != 'Description' group by airline, code order by airline limit 500

flows.name: airport-counts
flows.query: SELECT airline, count(*) AS total_count FROM [bigquery-samples.airline_ontime_data.flights] WHERE departure_airport = '{param1}' AND date = '{param2}' GROUP BY airline
